categories: Category:Moffs and Grand Moffs of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Lett-Shara was a female who held the rank of Moff in the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. Considered to be an unpleasant woman by Doctor Eckard Lokin, Lett-Shara was married to an officer of the same name in the Imperial Military.
